meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: Fie! That spoiled milk smells terrible.
meanings.sent2: Oh, fie on those rude manners!
meanings.sent3: Fie on the cat for knocking over the vase!
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds gathered, and the thunder roared, 'Fie!'
meanings.sent5: The chef tasted the soup and exclaimed, 'Fie! It needs more salt!'

meanings.definition: An exclamation of scorn or contempt.
meanings.sent1: Fie! I cannot believe you would say such a thing.
meanings.sent2: When he heard the news, he shouted, 'Fie on their lies!'
meanings.sent3: Fie on the squirrel who stole my nuts!
meanings.sent4: As the villain laughed, the hero cried out, 'Fie on your wicked ways!'
meanings.sent5: The crowd gasped in unison, 'Fie! This injustice cannot stand!'
